sentences.sContent: The deadline for the submission of proposals is May 1st.
sentences.sCn: 呈交提案的最后期限是 5 月 1 日。

sentences.sContent: Plans were drawn up for submission to the housing council.
sentences.sCn: 计划已起草，要提交给住房委员会。

sentences.sContent: Submissions will not be accepted after May.
sentences.sCn: 过了5月再提交将不予接受。

synos.tran: 投降；[计]提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭

words.tran: 连接主句和从句的；从属的
使服从（subordinate的ing形式）；使成为下级

trans.tranCn: 投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭
trans.tranOther: when you give or show something to someone in authority, for them to consider or approve
